Questions: How To Edit Details Of Agency?
tags: edit details agency how to edit or change the mobile number option 1 first option 1 option agent master agency master
Answers:
To edit any details in an agency, follow these steps ✨:

 

Step 1. 🖱️ Go to the 'Agency Master' option on the Home screen and click on it. Here, you will see all the agencies you have created.

 

Step 2. Each agency has an 'Edit' button, so click on the one you want to edit. Update the required details such as Agent Name and Date of Birth (DOB).

 

Step 3. After filling in the correct details, click on 'Save Agent Details' to save the changes. 📝

Questions: How to delete any agency?
tags: agency master option 1 first option 1 option remove delete agent agent master details delete agency Details delete agent
Answers:
🌟 You Can Delete Any Agency By Following Steps:
 
Step 1. Click on the first option ‘Agency Master’ on the homepage. Here you will see all existing agencies.
 
Step 2. To delete an agency, you will see a ‘Delete’ button on every agency. Select and click on the ‘Delete’ button. Your selected agency will be deleted.

Questions: How Can I Change My Agency Password If I've Forgotten It?
tags: agency password reset option 1 first option 1 option password agent master forget password change agency password
Answers:
If You've Forgotten Your Agency Password, No Problem! 🌟

 

🔹 Step 1: Go to 'Agency Master' on the Homepage, Select Your Agency, Click on 'Forget Password? Click Here to Reset' Button.

 

🔹 Step 2: Enter a New Password, and Confirm by Clicking 'Accept'. OTP Will Be Sent on Registered Mobile No. After OTP Verification, Your Password Will Be Reset.

 

To Reset Agency Password, Follow These Simple Steps 🚀

Questions: How Can I Create A New MPIN?
tags: mpin make new mpin option 1 first option 1 option create new mpin forget mpin
Answers:
You're just a few steps away from creating your new MPIN:

 

Step 1. 🔹 Navigate to the 'Agency Master' option on the homepage.

 

Step 2. 🔹 Select your agency, then opt for the 'By MPIN' option, and click on 'Create New MPIN'.

 

Step 3. 🔹 After successful OTP verification, your MPIN will be created.

Questions: How To Recover Mpin?
tags: recover mpin lost mpin option 1 first option 1 option find mpin
Answers:
🔍🔐🔍🔐 Recover Lost MPIN By These Steps: 🔐🔍🔐🔍

 

Step 1. 🌟 To recover Mpin, click on the first option ‘Agency Master’ on the homepage. Here you will see all existing agencies.

 

Step 2. 🌟 Select the agency whose Mpin you want to recover and click on it, then select the ‘By Mpin’ option.

 

Step 3. 🌟 Here you will see the ‘Recover Mpin’ button, click on it.

 

Step 4. 🌟 An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number after OTP verification. You can now easily recover your MPIN.

Questions: How to Download Agency Data?
tags: download agent data download agency data download policies data download data data downloading policy option 1 first option 1 option data agent master agency data 2 option option 2 second option
Answers:
🌟 You can Download Your Agency Data By Following These Steps:

 

Step 1. 🏠 Click on First Option Agency Master on Homepage, Here You Will See All Existing Agencies.

 

Step 2. 📥 To Download Agency Data, You Will See Download Button on Every Agency, Select and Click on ‘Download Button.

 

Step 3. 📩 Now Here You Will See Two Options First By OTP and Second By MPIN .

 

Step 4. 🔄 You Can Choose Any Option You Want. If You Choosing By OTP Option Then Click on New Policy Download/FUP Update Button.

 

Step 5. 📲 OTP Will Be Sent on Registered Mobile After OTP Verification Your Data Will Be Downloaded.

 

Step 6. 🔒 If You Are Choosing By MPIN Option Enter Details and MPIN, Then Click on New Policy Download/FUP Update Button and Your Agency Data Will Start Downloading.

 

Or you can also download the data directly:


Step 1. 🏠 You have to click on the second option 'DOWNLOAD DATA' on the homescreen.


Step 2. 📥 You can now download Data by above same steps.

Questions: How To Create New Agency In App
tags: make new agency option 1 first option 1 option create agency master
Answers:
Starting A New Agency Is Easy By Below Steps:

 

🚀 Step 1: Navigate to the Homepage and Select 'Agency Master.' Click On the Plus Button Near the Search Icon.

 

📝 Step 2: Enter Agent Name, Agent Mobile No, Enter Agent Code+Branch Code, Create Password And Enter Date Of Birth Of Agent.

 

💾 Step 3: Click On 'Save Agents Details' Button. New Agency Will Be Saved Successfully.

Questions: How to Add a New Policy or Policy Holder?
tags: add new policy create forth option 4th option 4 option new policy make new policy
Answers:
To add a new policy do following Steps

 

🌟 Step 1: simply go to the home screen and choose 'Add Service Policy'.

 

🌟 Step 2: Fill out required details such as policy holder name, their mobile number, date of birth, date of commencement, plan number, term, premium paying term, sum assured, premium amount, FUP date, maturity date, payment mode, status, and address.

 

🌟 Step 3: After filling out these details, click on the 'Submit' button.

 

Your newly created policy will be saved automatically.

Questions: How to use Agency Master?
tags: master1 nach status chech nach update kare nach status update kare NACH STATUS nach 14 option  14 option status find nach status
Answers:
Welcome to Agency Master

Your gateway to seamless agency management.

Agency Master is the first option on the homescreen. In Agency Master you get all your agencies, you can see all your agencies and their details. You get many options here like

Options:

1. 📥 Download: Retrieve your data effortlessly.
2. ✏️ Edit: Keep your agent details up-to-date with ease.
3. 🗑️ Delete: Streamline agency and agent removal effortlessly.
4. 📜 Policies Info: Access comprehensive policy information swiftly.
5. 📊 Status Summary: Stay informed with detailed policy status updates.
6. 🤝 Share Data: Seamlessly distribute agency data as needed.
7. ℹ️ More Info: For more information about the agency.
 
You can use these options as per your need.

🔸 Step 2. Now you will get the fourth option '4. ANY POLICY STATEMENT' 🔸

 

🔹 Step 3. Now you have to click on the send button below. 🔹

 

🔸 Step 4. Now you have to select the policy number, date of birth and financial year. 🔸

 

🔹 Step 5. Now you have to click on 'SUBMIT' button. 🔹

 

📄 The policy statement will appear in front of you 📄

Questions: HOW TO SEE REVIVAL OR OUTSTANDING STATUS
tags: revival check statement outstanding any policy outstanding 17 17 option
Answers:
Step 1. 🏠 First of all, you will find the 17th option on the homescreen. Click on '17. POLICY TRACKER'

 

Step 2. 🖱️ You will get the fifth option '5. Click on '5. REVIVAL OR OUTSTANDING'

 

Step 3. 📝 Now you have to enter the policy number, date of birth, and basic premium without tax amount.

 

Step 4. 🕵️‍♂️ Now you have to click on the 'SEARCH ONLINE' button

 

🔍 REVIVAL OR OUTSTANDING status will appear in front of you.

Questions: How to check loan status on policy

Answers:

Step 2. 🖱️ You will get the 6th option. Click on '6. POLICY LOAN'

 

Step 3. 🔢 Now you have to enter the policy number, date of birth, and basic premium without tax amount.

 

Step 4. 🌐 Now you have to click on 'SEARCH ONLINE' button

 

📜 POLICY LOAN status will appear in front of you.

Questions: How to get premium certificate
tags: premium certificate check policy premium certificate any policy premium certificate  17 17 option
Answers:
Step 1. 🏠 First of all you will find the 17th option on the homescreen. Click on '17. POLICY TRACKER'

 

Step 2. ➡️ Now you have to click on the 8th option '8. PREMIUM CERTIFICATES'

 

Step 3. 📝 Now you have to enter the agency, policy number, financial year and policy number.

 

Step 4. 🔍 Now you have to click on the 'SEARCH' button

 

Certificates will appear in front of you which you can download.

Questions: How to check policy dispatch status?
tags: dispatch status check policy dispatch status any policy dispatch status find policy dispatch status  17 17 option
Answers:
Step 1. 🏠 First of all you will find the 17th option on the homescreen. Click on '17. POLICY TRACKER'

 

Step 2. ➡️ Now you have to click on the 11th option '11. POLICY DISPATCH STATUS'

 

Step 3. 📝 Now you have to enter the policy number and select the agency.

 

Step 4. 🔍 Now you have to click on the 'CHECK SEARCH' button.

 

Policy dispatch status will appear in front of you.

Questions: How can you download the calendar of the app
tags: calender lic calender current year calender 22 22 option calender download download calender
Answers:
Step 1. 🏠 Go to homescreen click on '22. CALENDER 2024' option

 

Step 2. 🌍 Select the language in which you want to download the calendar.

 

Your calendar will start downloading.
